mapper.select: SELECT de.PK_DEPT_DE, de.CODE_DE, de.PK_PDDECATE, ca.CODE_DECATE FROM EX_PD_DE de INNER JOIN BD_PD_DECATE ca ON ca.PK_PDDECATE = de.PK_PDDECATE WHERE PK_PDDE = #{pkPdde}

select distinct de.code_de page_no, dept.OLD_CODE ward_sn, null as group_no, sysdate as submit_time, null as cofirm_time, null as confirm_oper, null as atf_no, 0 as flag, de.name_decate bylx from ex_pd_de de inner join bd_ou_dept dept on de.pk_dept_ap = dept.pk_dept where de.pk_dept_de = #{pkDeptDe} And de.code_de = #{codeDe}

select pi.code_ip as INPATIENT_NO, pi.code_pi as P_ID, substr(pi.name_pi, 1, 18) AS NAME, pv.age_pv as AGE, null as DEPT_SN, ward.OLD_CODE as WARD_SN, ward.name_dept as WARD_NAME, ord.name_emp_ord as DOCTOR, pv.bed_no as BED_NO, case when sup.name is null then 'ç©º' else sup.name end as commt, ord.note_supply as COMM2, pd.OLD_CODE as DRUG_CODE, pd.name as DRUGNAME, pd.spec as specification, pd.vol as DOSAGE, unit_min.name as DOS_UNIT, ord.quan as AMOUNT, (SELECT sum(de.QUAN_MIN) FROM EX_PD_DE de WHERE de.CODE_DE = pdde.code_de and de.PK_PV = pdde.PK_PV AND de.PK_PD = pdde.PK_PD) AS TOTAL, to_date(to_char(occ.date_plan, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi'), 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') as OCC_TIME, '0' as FLAG, null as ATF_NO, '0' as PRI_FLAG, pdde.code_de as PAGE_NO, ord.ordsn || to_char(sysdate, 'dd') || '-' || to_number(substr(pdde.CODE_DE, 7, 4)) as DETAIL_SN, null as GEN_TIME, ord.ordsn as EXECDALISTID, pdde.code_de as SEQNO, null as BAGNO, CASE WHEN deca.CODE_DECATE = '02' OR deca.CODE_DECATE = '09' OR deca.CODE_DECATE = '13' OR deca.CODE_DECATE = '01' OR deca.CODE_DECATE = '08' THEN CASE WHEN to_char(occ.date_plan, 'hh24') > '12' THEN to_char(occ.date_plan, 'hh24') - 12 || 'p' WHEN to_char(occ.date_plan, 'hh24') = '12' THEN to_char(occ.date_plan, 'hh24') || 'p' WHEN to_char(occ.date_plan, 'hh24') in ('11', '10') THEN to_char(occ.date_plan, 'hh24') || 'a' ELSE substr(to_char(occ.date_plan, 'hh24'), 2, 1) || 'a' END END as prn_comm from ex_pd_de pdde inner join cn_order ord on pdde.pk_cnord = ord.pk_cnord inner join bd_pd pd on pdde.pk_pd = pd.pk_pd inner join pv_encounter pv on pdde.pk_pv = pv.pk_pv inner join pi_master pi on pv.pk_pi = pi.pk_pi inner join bd_ou_dept ward on ord.pk_dept_ns = ward.pk_dept left join bd_supply sup on ord.code_supply = sup.code inner join bd_unit unit_min on ord.pk_unit_dos = unit_min.pk_unit inner join ex_order_occ occ on pdde.pk_pdapdt = occ.pk_pdapdt inner join bd_pd_decate deca on deca.pk_pddecate = pdde.pk_pddecate where pdde.pk_dept_de = #{pkDeptDe} and pdde.code_de = #{codeDe} and pdde.pk_pddecate = #{pkPddecate} and pdde.eu_direct = '1' group by pi.code_ip, pi.code_pi, pi.name_pi, pv.age_pv, ward.OLD_CODE, ward.name_dept, ord.name_emp_ord, pv.bed_no, pdde.PK_PV, pdde.PK_PD, deca.CODE_DECATE, sup.name, ord.note_supply, pd.OLD_CODE, pd.name, pd.spec, pd.vol, unit_min.name, ord.quan, occ.date_plan, pdde.code_de, ord.ordsn
